text: :This article is about a village near Melun. Other meanings are at Valence Valence-en-Brie is a village in the ÃŽle-de-France region in France. It is located near Melun in the department Seine-et-Marne. In 1999, 583 people lived there. Category:Communes in Seine-et-Marne
